txt.en: You notice foes guard many bridges near the ruins of Barad-dûr. If you are to move about without getting captured, you will need to defeat some of these guards.
Barad-dûr sentries are stationed at bridges and patrol the ruins of the vile tower.
You have defeated many of the sentries that guard Barad-dûr and have made the passage through eastern Dor Amarth a bit safer.
Barad-dûr sentries can be found near the bones of Barad-dûr.\n\nYou should defeat an sentries that you come across.
